code.translate: код, кодекс, кодировка, законы, кодировать, шифровать, кодифицировать
examples: He managed to hack the code.
Each employee is given a code number.
He tapped his security code into the computer.
We have a relaxed dress code at the office.
The army has a strict code of conduct.
They didn't realise that we'd broken their secret code.
Theodosian Code
Every government is bound to digest the whole law into a code.
Each product has been coded.
All reports must be sent in code.
Use order code GSL on the order form.
She writes code faster than anybody else.
You must enter a code to override the alarm.
He tapped in the code and the lock disengaged.
We should encode the message for security reasons.
a single legal code for all
The message was sent in code.
the knight's code of chivalry
The general sent a coded message.
section 1123 of the bankruptcy code
Every secret agent has a code name.
The message was written in secret code.
He was hired to write programming code.
A code was assigned to each batch of work.
Our boffins finally broke the enemy's code!
Every item in the store has a product code.
the Law Society's Code of Professional Conduct
Goods that you order must have a product code.
Enter your security code to access the computer.
Scientists worked day and night to break the code.

В армии строгие правила поведения.

Каждому товару соответствует код.
Все отчёты необходимо присылать в зашифрованном виде.
На бланке заказа укажите код заказа: GSL.
Она пишет код быстрее, чем кто-либо другой.
Чтобы отключить сигнал тревоги, необходимо ввести код.

единое законодательство для всех
